title: 100% Blind ONE PIECE Review (Part 10): Sabaody Archipelago
author: Totally Not Mark
description: A comprehensive review of the Sabaody Archipelago arc including Episode 394, done as a blind first-time experience by a popular anime analyst.

title: One Piece Reaction - Episode 393-394 (Blind Reaction) - FIRST TIME SEEING SILVERS RAYLEIGH!!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A blind reaction to Episodes 393-394 featuring the first appearance of Silvers Rayleigh at the auction house.

title: SILVERS RAYLEIGH IS A LEGEND!! - One Piece Episode 393 & 394 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A combined reaction and review of Episodes 393-394 focusing on the legendary reveal of Silvers Rayleigh.

title: Silvers Rayleigh REVEALED! - One Piece Episode 394 REACTION
author: Unknown Reactor
description: Episode 394 reaction specifically focused on the reveal of Silvers Rayleigh at the Human Auctioning House.

title: 394-396: Rescue Camie! The Archipelago's Lingering Dark History, Time Limit – The Human Auction Begins and The Fist Explodes! Destroy the Auction
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A detailed blog review of episodes 394-396 from a first-time watcher's perspective, praising Oda's balance of world-building, character introductions, and dramatic moments.

title: One Piece – Sabaody Archipelago Arc (Episodes 385 – 405) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Sabaody Archipelago arc including Episode 394, analyzing the arc's themes of slavery, justice, and the introduction of the Eleven Supernovas.

title: Episode 394, "Arcs of Consequence" (Part One)
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: The One Piece Podcast Episode 394 (note: this is podcast episode 394, not about anime episode 394). Features discussion of arc rankings with guests Bryan Newton, Jammer, The Dude, Steve Yurko, Ed, and Zach Logan.

title: Rescue Camie! The Archipelago's Lingering Dark History
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming of One Piece Episode 394 on Crunchyroll.
